Description_lang: While Dark Soul is active, Haunt's duration is increased by ${$138483m1/1000} sec, Chaos Bolt and Shadowburn consume $s2% less Embers, and abilities cost $s3% less Demonic Fury.

description_blz.en_US: While Dark Soul is active, Haunt's duration is increased by 4 sec, Chaos Bolt and Shadowburn consume 20% less Embers, and abilities cost 30% less Demonic Fury.
description_blz.es_MX: Mientras Alma oscura está activa, la duración de Poseer aumenta 4 s, Descarga de Caos y Quemadura de las Sombras consumen un 20% menos de ascuas y las facultades cuestan un 30% menos de furia demoníaca.
description_blz.pt_BR: Enquanto Alma Negra estiver ativa, a duração da sua habilidade Assombrar é aumentada em 4 s, Seta do Caos e Sombra Ardente consomem 20% a menos de Brasas e as habilidades custam 30% a menos de Fúria Demoníaca.
description_blz.de_DE: Während 'Finstere Seele' aktiv ist, wird die Effektdauer von 'Heimsuchung' um 4 Sek. erhöht, 'Chaosblitz' und 'Schattenbrand' verbrauchen 20% weniger instabile Funken und Eure Fähigkeiten kosten 30% weniger Dämonischen Furor.
description_blz.en_GB: While Dark Soul is active, Haunt's duration is increased by 4 sec, Chaos Bolt and Shadowburn consume 20% less Embers, and abilities cost 30% less Demonic Fury.
description_blz.es_ES: Mientras Alma oscura está activa, la duración de Poseer aumenta 4 s, Descarga de Caos y Quemadura de las Sombras consumen un 20% menos de ascuas y las facultades cuestan un 30% menos de furia demoníaca.
description_blz.fr_FR: Tant qu’Âme sombre est active, la durée de Hanter est augmentée de 4 s, Trait du chaos et Brûlure de l’ombre consomment 20% de Braises en moins, et les techniques coûtent 30% de Fureur démoniaque en moins.
description_blz.it_IT: Quando Anima Oscura è attiva, la durata di Tormento aumenta di 4 s, il consumo di braci di Dardo del Caos e Combustione dell'Ombra si riduce del 20% e il costo in furia demoniaca delle abilità si riduce del 30%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Во время действия "Черной души" действие "Блуждающего духа" продлевается на 4 сек., "Стрела Хаоса" и "Ожог Тьмы" расходуют на 20% меньше раскаленных углей, а способности стоят на 30% меньше демонической ярости.
description_blz.ko_KR: 악마의 영혼이 활성화되어 있으면, 유령 출몰의 지속시간이 4초만큼 증가하고, 혼돈의 화살과 어둠의 연소에 소비되는 불씨가 20%만큼 감소하며, 기술 사용에 소비되는 악마의 분노가 30%만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在黑闇之魂的持續期間內，蝕魂術的持續時間延長4秒，混沌箭和暗影灼燒消耗的燃火餘燼減少20%，並且技能消耗的惡魔之怒減少30%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 当黑暗灵魂激活时，鬼影缠身的持续时间延长4秒，混乱之箭和暗影灼烧所消耗的灰烬减少20%，技能所消耗的恶魔之怒降低30%。
